thread.title: Jennifer Garner makes first red carpet appearance post split
thread.title_full: Jennifer Garner makes first red carpet appearance post split - Entertainment

author: IANS
title: Jennifer Garner makes first red carpet appearance post split
text:
Los Angeles: Actress Jennifer Garner returned to the red carpet after splitting from husband Ben Affleck.


Jennifer Garner 
The actress looked elegant in a black outfit when attending an charity dinner event of Baby2Baby, an organisation that supplies low-income families with diapers and children's clothing, at Chanel Boutique here, reports aceshowbiz.com.
The 49-year-old wore a sleeveless knee-length dress paired with strappy heels.
She was joined at the event by fellow female stars like Rachel Bilson, Ellen Pompeo, Jenna Dewan-Tatum, and Selma Blair.
The couple, who got divorced after 10 years of marriage a day after their 10th wedding anniversary on June 30, have three children -- Violet, Seraphina and Samuel.
